featured.text: The construction of the Going-to-the-Sun Road was a huge task.

other.text: A triumph for medical technology, Oddsson’s fish skin transplantation was actually part of the astonishing achievement of “100% Fish,” an ambitious task in promoting environmental efficiency.

definition.zh_def: 任務；工作；需要完成的事情。
definition.en_def: A piece of work or duty that is assigned or undertaken.
definition.example: Completing this task will help us meet our deadline.
